title: Demis Hassabis on our AI future: ‘It’ll be 10 times bigger than the Industrial Revolution - and maybe 10 times faster’
description: The head of Google’s DeepMind says artificial intelligence could usher in an era of ‘incredible productivity’ and ‘radical abundance’. But who will it benefit? And why does he wish the tech giants had moved more slowly?
content: If you have a mental image of a Nobel prizewinner, Demis Hassabis probably doesn’t fit it. Relatively young (he’s 49), mixed race (his father is Greek-Cypriot, his mother Chinese-Singaporean), state-educated, he didn’t exactly look out of place recei... [14665 chars]

title: Artificial intelligence could end disease, lead to "radical abundance," Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis says
description: At Google DeepMind, researchers are chasing what's called artificial general intelligence: a silicon intellect as versatile as a human's, but with superhuman speed and knowledge.

title: Is it still Disney magic if it’s AI?
description: The stakes are especially high for the studio, caught between how to use artificial intelligence in the filmmaking process and how to protect its famed characters against it.
content:
When Disney began working on a new, live-action version of its hit cartoon “Moana," executives started to ponder whether they should clone its star, Dwayne Johnson.
The actor was reprising his role in the movie as Maui, a barrel-chested demigod, but ... [13762 chars]

title: Why people are falling in love with AI chatbots
description: More people are forming romantic bonds with artificial intelligence, sparking debate over whether these relationships represent progress or peril.
content:
As AI-powered chatbots become more popular, AI-human relationships are a new and growing phenomenon.
People are falling in love with their chatbots. There are now dozens of apps that offer intimate companionship with an AI-powered bot, and they have ... [6010 chars]

title: Elon Musk reveals why AI won’t replace consultants anytime soon-and it’s not what you think
description: Artificial intelligence poses a genuine threat to jobs, particularly analysts, as firms like McKinsey adapt to technology that can perform tasks faster. AI's integration is reshaping client interactions, hiring, and project selection, prompting discussions on its impact within the company.
content:
The threat of artificial intelligence taking away many jobs previously conducted by humans is real, and reports are now emerging daily that show how the new technology is changing the workforce.

title: AI Fuels Wall Street Surge Despite Economic Concerns
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) investments have buoyed Wall Street, driving second quarter earnings higher despite tariff concerns. With 297 S&P 500 companies reporting results, earnings growth estimates increased from 5.8% to 9.8%. Strong earnings from companies like Microsoft and Meta Platforms reassured investors about AI's future potential.
content: Amid concerns over tariffs and economic slowdown, Artificial Intelligence (AI) investments have invigorated Wall Street's performance at near record highs. This resurgence is evidenced by the latest earnings reports from 297 of the S&P 500 companies,... [669 chars]

description: Tech giants reported eye-watering figures linked to artificial intelligence investment.
content:
